    The Class BuildVectorForInputFile: build the file vector for input file.
    BuildWordCountMatrix
    Build word count matrix and also total word count of each file(store in a separate configuration file).
    CalculateIG
    This class reads the matrix file and then compute the information gain accordingly.
    CalculateSimilarity
    The Class CalculateSimilarity.
    Classifier
    The Class Classifier.
    FeatureSelection
    The Class FeatureSelection.
    ReadContent
    This class reads content from the given path(Folder or File), and returns a String array This String array will only contain words consisting of [a-zA-Z-], filtering function included Refactor from IO.java
    SingleFileWordCount
    This class aims to count all the words and its occurrences of one file.
